title: Initial type hints for function_wrapper
body_html:
I'd like to add type hints to function_wrapper.py so that it's easier to read/modify.

This pr adds initial type hints. This isn't very useful because of how large FunctionOption is... (see below) but refactoring of the code to be more readable can come later.

cc @ezyang

Test Plan

build and run tests
Install mypy and run python -m mypy --py2 function_wrapper.py

body:
I'd like to add type hints to `function_wrapper.py` so that it's easier to read/modify.

This pr adds initial type hints. This isn't very useful because of how large `FunctionOption` is... (see below) but refactoring of the code to be more readable can come later.

cc @ezyang 

### Test Plan
build and run tests
Install mypy and run `python -m mypy --py2 function_wrapper.py`
